projects.title: Mega Market Mayhem
projects.description: A fast-paced multiplayer 1v1 fighting game where players compete to see who's on top with quirky and fun food based characters, all while managing chaos in a bustling supermarket.

projects.title: Scriptorium
projects.description: An immersive narrative dungeon crawler where one must draw to attack, utilizing advanced neural model recognition players can learn a new language of actions.
